thread.section_title: Oh Hello Clothing Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Oh Hello Clothing | ohelloclothing.com
thread.title: Natalie Snowden
thread.title_full: Oh Hello Clothing reviewed by Natalie Snowden

author: Natalie Snowden
title: Natalie Snowden
text:
I had been set with the task of finding my own bridesmaids dress for my cousin's wedding in ibiza for July 2017. I had searched high and low for a white, crochet dress, when "Oh Hello Clothing" popped up on my Facebook with the perfect dress! I ordered the spirit of spring dress immediately! The transaction was flawless and the delivery was very prompt (coming from Ireland to Preston, UK).
I was delighted to find the dress was just as it looked on the picture and fit like a dream.
I was so impressed I ordered the Claudia dress (awaiting delivery) for ladies day!!
I will continue to buy these beautiful dresses and recommend you do too!
